alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 6:52PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Flagler and southeastern St. Johns Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 651 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 7 miles east of Marineland, or 11 miles northeast of Palm Coast, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Marineland and Beverly Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler
